Functions

Function(s) admin.delete_old_eventcontroldo.
To be used as Database Job. Remove oldÂ history entries of closed Events, except the last state (state=8000). Delete at max "batchsize" old EventControlDO and their history that are older than "days2keep". This deletion is done for all possible EventControlDO status("EventControlDO"."stateRef") To prevent the deletion of possible pending evaluations the configuration parameter days2keep must not be less thane 7 days. example: select admin.delete_old_eventcontroldo('{"days2keep": 183, "batchsize": 5000}');

FUNCTION admin.delete_old_eventcontroldo ( config json ) RETURNS integer LANGUAGE 'plpgsql' volatile;
